short_summary: Purchase of measuring and testing equipment and accessories
description: Purchase of electrical measuring and testing equipment and accessories. Additional details are available in the Contract Description section below.
tags: Art/liquidatory Tenders Ac],_direction Response-related Oxford defeats
full_summary:
# Tender Notice

## RFP Against Supply Arrangement

* Title (En): Keysight Technologies Thermocouple Power Sensor & Fluke Multimeter & RF Bird Wattmeter
* Title (Fr): Keysight Technologies Capteur de puissance à thermocouple & Multimètre Fluke & Wattmètre RF Bird
* Solicitation Number: W8486-239014/A
* Reference Number: cb-342-2241455
* Amendment Number: 6
* Notice Type (En): Request for Proposal (RFP) against Supply Arrangement
* Notice Type (Fr): Demande de proposition découlant d’un arrangement en matière d’approvisionnement

## Tender Description

The Department of National Defence invites bids from qualified suppliers for the provision of electrical measuring and testing equipment and accessories, as described below.

* Item 1: Keysight Technologies Thermocouple Power Sensor (P/N N8487A-CFT, NSN: 6625 20-A0Y6058) - 2 units
* Item 2: Fluke Multimeter (P/N 28 II-DD, NSN: 6625 20-0050784) - 100 units
* Item 3: Fluke Multimeter (P/N 289, NSN: 6625 01-5641962) - 5 units
* Item 4: RF Bird Wattmeter (P/N 4421A-20-11-0, NSN: 6625 20-A0Y8119) - 3 units
* Item 5: RF Bird Power Sensor (P/N 4024, NSN: 6625 01-4594177) - 6 units

Deliveries are to be made to 25 CFSD Montréal, Receipts Section, 6363 rue Notre Dame St. E, Montréal, QC, H1N 3V9, by February 29, 2024.

## Tender Requirements

* Bidders may propose an equivalent or substitute product, provided they provide the brand name, model and/or part number, and NCAGE.
* A preference will be given to Canadian goods and/or services.
* The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

## Important Dates

* Tender Closing Date: November 22, 2023, at 14:00
* Expected Contract Start Date: November 29
